abstract: Campus Corner column; since 1959, University of Michigan has announced scores for Slippery Rock University, obscure Division II football team, over its public address system; odd tradition has traveled, and today Slippery Rock's scores are announced at home games for number of other universities.
lead_paragraph: At a program that has no shortage of traditions, Michigan fans have been cheering the Rock, a Division II school in the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference, for more than a half-century.

headline.main: Slippery Rock’s Tie to Michigan Is All in the Name
headline.print_headline: Slippery Rock’s Tie to Michigan Is in Name Only, Always Cheered

snippet: At a program that has no shortage of traditions, Michigan fans have been cheering the Rock, a Division II school in the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference, for more than a half-century.
